conversations.startConversationMessage: This is the beginning of your conversation with us. Please send a message to get started.
conversations.autoStartConversationMessage: This is the beginning of your conversation with us.
conversations.sessionExpirationWarningMessage: Please note that the session will expire after <%sessionMinutes%> minutes of inactivity.
conversations.signedOutMessage: You've been signed out from this session.
conversations.disconnectMessageSend: Resume conversation by sending a new message
conversations.notificationBody: You have one or more unread messages.
conversations.ariaMessageFailed: Failed to send, please type again.
conversations.ariaReadOnlyError: Session is read-only, no new messages allowed.
conversations.ariaStartNewConversation: Click to start the new conversation
conversations.ariaQuickReply: Click to reply with this message
conversations.ariaCardActionPostback: Click to reply with this message.
conversations.ariaCobrowseActionPostback: Click to reply with this action.
conversations.ariaNextButton: Next. Press Enter or Space to move to the next slide in the carousel.
conversations.ariaPreviousButton: Previous. Press Enter or Space to move to the previous slide in the carousel.
conversations.ariaTabKeyNavigation: Use Shift+Tab key to navigate through the slide.
conversations.ariaArrowKeyNavigation: Use Arrow keys to navigate between the slides.
conversations.offer.cobrowseOfferDescription: We request that you share your screen
conversations.offer.videoOfferDescription: We request that you join a video chat session with us
conversations.info.unsupportedFormsMessage: We're sorry but preview does not yet support Forms.
conversations.info.unsupportedAuthenticationMessage: We're sorry but preview does not yet support sending outbound authentication requests.
conversations.info.unsupportedApplePayMessage: We're sorry but preview does not yet support sending payment requests.
conversations.info.unsupportediMessageAppsMessage: We're sorry but preview does not yet support Sending Applications.
conversations.info.unsupportedListPickerMessage: We're sorry but preview does not yet support List Picker content, routing to first selection.
conversations.warning.sessionExpiryMessage: Please note that your session will expire after 5 minutes due to inactivity.
conversations.errors.startFailed: We are unable to start a conversation. Please try again later.
conversations.errors.restoreFailed: We're sorry, but we are unable to restore your conversation.
conversations.errors.generic: We apologize but something unexpected happened. Please try again later.
conversations.errors.fileNameInvalid: We're sorry but the file name contains unexpected invalid characters that weâ€™re unable to identify
conversations.errors.fileNameTooLong: We're sorry but the file name is too long. Please retry with a shorter name.
conversations.errors.fileTypeInvalid: We're sorry but only <%allowedFileTypes%> file types are supported.
conversations.errors.fileTypeInvalidMultipleFiles: We're sorry but this file type is not supported
conversations.errors.fileSizeZero: We're sorry, but the file has no content. Please retry with the file size greater than 0 Bytes and not exceeding <%maxFileSizeLimit%>
conversations.errors.fileTooLarge: We're sorry but the file size is too large. Please retry with file size not exceeding <%maxFileSizeLimit%>
conversations.errors.fileContentInvalid: We're sorry but the file may be corrupted. Please retry with valid file.
conversations.errors.fileNotFound: We're sorry but but we are unable to retrieve the file. We apologize for the inconvenience.
conversations.alert.confirmClearConversation: Would you like to clear and leave your conversation? Message history will be lost.
conversations.alert.confirmSignIn: Sign-in to confirm your identity for this conversation. You will be signed-out from other sessions.

knowledge.articleNotFound: Sorry, this article can not be found
knowledge.removedArticle: This article was probably removed. Try going back or use the search bar.

cobrowse.otpMessage: The agent you are speaking with will provide a 6-digit meeting ID to connect this browser to a Co-browse session. This screen will then be shared with them. The meeting ID will expire in 5 minutes if not connected.
cobrowse.ariaConnect: Press Enter or space key to go to connect screen
cobrowse.errors.cobrowseActive: Co-browse could not be started as there is already an active session.
cobrowse.errors.joinFailure: Invalid meeting ID, please try again.

datePicker.ariaNextButton: Next. Press Enter or Space to move to the next set of days in the carousel.
datePicker.ariaPreviousButton: Previous. Press Enter or Space to move to the previous set of days in the carousel.
datePicker.ariaDownArrowKeyNotification: Press Down Arrow to select the time slot.

listPicker.ariaInstructions: Use arrow keys to navigate options, space or enter to select.
listPicker.ariaLabel: Select an option from the list
